name: ColoradoTrail
0:
”Alexa, ask Colorado Trail for information about the trail.”
”Alexa, ask Colorado Trail about segment 6.”
”Alexa ask Colorado Trail about closures.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: colorado trail
des: Get mileage, elevations, and trail information about the Colorado Trail, which generally follows the Continental Divide between Denver and Durango. Includes all twenty-eight segments of the main route, and all of the Collegiate West sections.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
